import { useState } from "react"; import { Navigate } from "react-router-dom"; const NavBar = () => { const [searchformovie,setSearchForMovie]=useState(''); const handlechange = (event)=>{ setSearchForMovie(event.target.value); } const handleSearch = ()=>{ window.location.href = '/search/'+searchformovie; } return (

get the latest movie updates

BY GENRE TRENDING

); } export default NavBar;
